name: DOCS_RCVD_MED_IND_INFO
description: This table stores indications of use info for medications.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: INDICATION_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the reference ID for an indication associated with a medication

columns.name: IND_MED_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the reference ID of the medication associated with the indication.

columns.name: INDICATION_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Medical Condition ID of the indication associated with a medication.

columns.name: INDICATION_ID_MEDICAL_COND_NAME
columns.description: This contains the name of the medical condition.

columns.name: INDICATION_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the indication display name.
